df-oposet
blocks.content: Define the class of orthoposets, which are bounded posets with an orthocomplementation operation. Note that ` ( Base ` p ) e. dom ( lub ` p ) ` means there is an upper bound ` 1. ` , and similarly for the ` 0. ` element. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 13-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-oposet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cops, crab(s0, cpo, wa(wa(wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cdm(cfv(club, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(s0))))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(coc, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), w3a(w3a(wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cv(s2)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), wbr(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cfv(cp1, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmee, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), cfv(cp0, cv(s0)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

thm opoccl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(coc, c0))
} = {
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1), wi(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cple, c0), cfv(c3, c1))))
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1), wi(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cple, c0), cfv(c3, c1)))), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cjn, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cp1, c0)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmee, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cp0, c0)))
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, cops), wcel(c1, c2), w3a(w3a(wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c1), wi(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cple, c0), cfv(c3, c1)))), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cjn, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cp1, c0)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmee, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cp0, c0))))
  oposlem(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, cfv(cple, c0), cfv(cjn, c0), cfv(cp1, c0), cfv(cmee, c0), cfv(cp0, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cjn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmee, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cp0, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cp1, c0))
}

thm opoccl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà OP ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c1)‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(oc ` c0)

  oposlem(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, (le ` c0), (join ` c0), (1. ` c0), (meet ` c0), (0. ` c0))

thm cmtvalN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

  ‚ä£ c5 =(cm ` c0)

  bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c3), c2[c5]c4, c2 =((c2[c6]c4)[c7](c2[c6](c8 ` c4))), c2[{ < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3)‚àß hs0 =((hs0[c6]hs1)[c7](hs0[c6](c8 ` hs1))))}]c4)

thm oldmm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(coc, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c4, co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, c3)), co(c1, c6, cfv(c4, c3)), co(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c6, cfv(c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, co(cfv(c4, c1), c5, c3)), co(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c6, cfv(c4, c3))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  sylan(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cops))
  opoccl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  oldmm1(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c6, cfv(c4, c3), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1), wcel(c0, cops))

  opococ(c0, c1, c2, c4)

  oveq2d(c1, c5, (c3[c5]c4), (c4[c5]c3), (c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)))
  3adant3r1(c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c4)=(c4[c5]c3))
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà OL, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c3[c5]c4)=(c4[c5]c3), c0 ‚àà Lat)
  ollat(c0)
  latmcom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  latmassOLD(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c5]c4)[c5]c3)=(c1[c5](c4[c5]c3)), c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà OL, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2)

}

blocks.name: latmrot

blocks.origin:
thm latmrot(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c4, c5, c1), c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c4, c5, c1), c5, c3), co(c4, c5, co(c1, c5, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(c4, c5, co(c1, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c0, clat))
  ollat(c0)
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  latmcom(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), c2, c4, c5)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c4, c5, c1), c5, c3), co(c4, c5, co(c1, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, col), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latmassOLD(c0, c4, c2, c1, c3, c5)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c5]c3)[c5]c4)=((c4[c5]c1)[c5]c3))

  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c1[c5]c3)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Lat, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà OL, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà Lat)

blocks.name: latm4
blocks.content: Rearrangement of lattice meet of 4 classes. ( ~ in4 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latm4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5))), co(c1, c6, co(c4, c6, co(c3, c6, c5))), w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  oveq2d(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(c4, c6, co(c3, c6, c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(c4, c6, co(c3, c6, c5))), wcel(c0, col), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  latm12(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5)))), wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c4, c6, c5), c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wcel(co(c4, c6, c5), c2), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  latmcl(c0, c4, c2, c5, c6)
  latmassOLD(c0, c1, c2, c3, co(c4, c6, c5), c6)
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c4), c6, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(c1, c6, co(c4, c6, co(c3, c6, c5)))), wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c5), c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simp2l(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wcel(co(c3, c6, c5), c2), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(c0, clat))
  ollat(c0)
  simp2r(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simp3r(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  latmcl(c0, c3, c2, c5, c6)
  latmassOLD(c0, c1, c2, c4, co(c3, c6, c5), c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latm4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c6]c3)[c6](c4[c6]c5))=((c1[c6]c4)[c6](c3[c6]c5)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c1[c6]c3)[c6](c4[c6]c5)), ((c1[c6]c4)[c6](c3[c6]c5)), (c1[c6](c3[c6](c4[c6]c5))), (c1[c6](c4[c6](c3[c6]c5))), (c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)))
  oveq2d(c1, c6, (c3[c6](c4[c6]c5)), (c4[c6](c3[c6]c5)), (c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), (c3[c6](c4[c6]c5))=(c4[c6](c3[c6]c5)), c0 ‚àà OL, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  latm12(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c6](c4[c6]c5))=(c1[c6](c3[c6](c4[c6]c5))), c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4[c6]c5)‚àà c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), (c4[c6]c5)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Lat, c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  latmcl(c0, c4, c2, c5, c6)
  latmassOLD(c0, c1, c2, c3, (c4[c6]c5), c6)
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c6]c4)[c6](c3[c6]c5))=(c1[c6](c4[c6](c3[c6]c5))), c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c2, (c3[c6]c5)‚àà c2)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà OL, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))
  simp2l(c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))
  simp3l(c0 ‚àà OL, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà OL ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), (c3[c6]c5)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Lat, c3 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà OL, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà Lat)
  ollat(c0)
  simp2r(c0 ‚àà OL, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))
  simp3r(c0 ‚àà OL, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  latmcl(c0, c3, c2, c5, c6)
  latmassOLD(c0, c1, c2, c4, (c3[c6]c5), c6)
}

thm latmmdiN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, co(c1, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, co(c1, c5, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c1), c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, c5, c1), c5, co(c3, c5, c4), c1, wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, c1), c1), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c0, clat))
  ollat(c0)

  syl122anc(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c1), c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, co(c1, c5, c4))), wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))

  simpr3(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latm4(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5)
}

thm latmmdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, col), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, co(c3, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {

  fveq2(hs0, c0, cjn)
  eqidd(s0, hs0 = c0)
  oveq123d(s1, (meet ` hs0), ((oc ` hs0)` s0), s1, c4, (c5 ` s0), hs0 = c0)

  eqidd(s1, hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((oc ` hs0), s0, c5, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((oc ` hs0), c5, (oc ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, coc)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(col)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s0[c2]s1 ‚Üí s1 =(s0[c3](s1[c4](c5 ` s0)))))))

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), c5, co(cv(hs1), c6, cfv(c7, cv(hs0))))), wbr(c1, c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(c1, c5, co(cv(hs1), c6, cfv(c7, c1)))))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, cv(hs1))

  oveq12d(cv(hs0), c5, co(cv(hs1), c6, cfv(c7, cv(hs0))), c1, co(cv(hs1), c6, cfv(c7, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

  breq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1, c4)
  eqeq12d(cv(hs1), co(c1, c5, co(cv(hs1), c6, cfv(c7, c1))), c3, co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, cfv(c7, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, co(cv(hs1), c6, cfv(c7, c1)), co(c3, c6, cfv(c7, c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))

thm omllaw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà OML ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3 ‚Üí c3 =(c1[c5](c3[c6](c7 ` c1)))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ c5 =(join ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(meet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(oc ` c0)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ‚àà OML, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c4]c3 ‚Üí c3 =(c1[c5](c3[c6](c7 ` c1)))))

  isoml(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, c7)

  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0[c4]hs1, hs1 =(hs0[c5](hs1[c6](c7 ` hs0))), c1[c4]hs1, hs1 =(c1[c5](hs1[c6](c7 ` c1))))
  breq1(hs0, c1, c4, hs1)
  eqeq2d(hs1, (hs0[c5](hs1[c6](c7 ` hs0))), (c1[c5](hs1[c6](c7 ` c1))), hs0 = c1)
  oveq12d(hs0, c5, (hs1[c6](c7 ` hs0)), c1, (hs1[c6](c7 ` c1)), hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  oveq2d(hs1, c6, (c7 ` hs0), (c7 ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, c7)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c3, c1[c4]hs1, hs1 =(c1[c5](hs1[c6](c7 ` c1))), c1[c4]c3, c3 =(c1[c5](c3[c6](c7 ` c1))))
  breq2(hs1, c3, c1, c4)
  eqeq12d(hs1, (c1[c5](hs1[c6](c7 ` c1))), c3, (c1[c5](c3[c6](c7 ` c1))), hs1 = c3)
  id(hs1 = c3)
  oveq2d(c1, c5, (hs1[c6](c7 ` c1)), (c3[c6](c7 ` c1)), hs1 = c3)
  oveq1(hs1, c3, c6, (c7 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.w((c1[c4]c3 ‚Üí c3 =(c1[c5](c3[c6](c7 ` c1)))))

thm omllaw2N(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(cfv(c6, c1), c7, c3)), c3)))

  eqcom(co(c1, c5, co(cfv(c6, c1), c7, c3)), c3)

  oveq2d(c1, c5, co(cfv(c6, c1), c7, c3), co(c3, c7, cfv(c6, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà OML ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3 ‚Üí(c1[c5]((c6 ` c1)[c7]c3))= c3))

blocks.name: omllaw3
blocks.content: Orthomodular law equivalent. Theorem 2(ii) of [Kalmbach] p. 22. ( ~ pjoml analog.) (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm omllaw3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, coml), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wceq(co(c3, c5, cfv(c6, c1)), c7)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(coc, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cp0, c0))

blocks.name: cmtidN
blocks.content: Any element commutes with itself. ( ~ cmidi analog.) (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: omlfh1N
blocks.content: Foulis-Holland Theorem, part 1. If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive. Part of Theorem 5 in [Kalmbach] p. 25. ( ~ fh1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

}
